description:
Cutting-edge tool for comparing and synchronizing the database data

dbForge Data Compare for SQL Server is a dedicated software tool that compares SQL data in databases. It is equally efficient working with databases, backups, and script folders. This tool allows you to compare the data of tables and review all discrepancies (export reports into several file formats if needed). After that, it can synchronize the databases with precise configuration. 

After comparing the data, it is possible to restore missing/corrupted data from backups up to one row. The data synchronization tasks are automated – the tool generates the deployment scripts users can apply at once or use in the scheduled processes. Data Compare can deploy data to SQL Server, SQL Server on Amazon RDS, and SQL Azure. 

dbForge Data Compare for SQL Server is a part of the database management Studio for SQL Server. It is also a mini-tool for SSMS that enhances the standard functionality.
displayName: dbForge Data Compare for SQL Server
summary: Cutting-edge tool for comparing and synchronizing the database data
author: Devart
